Springfield.Lane County History Museum: Lane County History Museum, located on the county fairgrounds in Lane County in Eugene, Oregon, United States, has ongoing exhibits on the Oregon Trail, crafts, decades of the 1920s and 1930s, historic vehicles, and photographs. The museum also provides research materials, school tours, a speaker's bureau, and grants for heritage outreach projects. The museum and the Lane County Clerk's Building near the museum entrance are both administered by the Lane County Historical Society.
